price: 6. Mpe ya solo, ozali koyamba kurani oyo kowuta epai ya oyo azali na bwanya atonda mayele.
arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-innaka latulaqqā al-qur'āna min ladun ḥakīmin ʿalīmin
